interestingcomments.selftext: I have a personal project in which I am creating the fictional town of Innsmouth (created by author H.P. Lovecraft)  in real life with photographs. I am planning to buy a Leica 21mm lens to add to my kit, for this project. I'd love to hear opinions from people who have used 21mm lenses. I am looking for interesting characteristics, the lens doesn't have to be the sharpest in the world. Think fog, dread and gloom.
interestingcomments.title: Which Leica 21mm lens for B&W photography in very foggy conditions by the sea?
